title: Please Love Me From Now On! - Novel Updates
tags: Appearance Changes   Fantasy World   Male to Female   Reluctant Protagonist   Royalty   Tomboyish Female Lead   Transmigration   Transported to Another World   Tsundere
author: 長曽根モヒート
description:
When Yuri, a male college student, awoke from a traffic accident, it was within the world of a romance novel.

In front of me is the prince of the other party role, and I'm wearing a dress and the appearance of the heroine. This is something that all girls admire – “What???” What kind of joke is this...?

To return to the original world, why not fall in love with the prince as the story in the novel went?

However, the heroine role is difficult for Yuri who has lived as a man, and he seems to only keep failing.

Can he drop the prince safely and return to his original world?>
